author: Chip Zdarsky
title: Chip Zdarsky’s Guide to Entertainment Consumption During Self-isolation
description: We asked Chip Zdarsky for a list of what he's doing to pass the time and quickly regretted that decision.
content: As a comic book writer and artist, self-isolation is kind of my thing, so a lot of people have been turning to me for tips during all of this. Even well before the current pandemic, I was always happy to give unsolicited advice, screaming from my window, Show… [+7574 chars]
